column5: Host your holiday get together here!!! Enjoy staying in our luxurious new 4 Bedroom, 4.5 Bath University Park 3700 sf home in the prestigious Park Cities! Previous Celebrity Home now can be yours! All bedrooms have attached bathrooms. 5 HD TV's. Netflix. HULU. HBO. Cable. WIFI. 8 beds (1K, 5 Queen, 2 Twin) + 4 inflatables. Whether a business traveler, bridal party, or family, come stay at a home and AirBnB of professional athletes, socialites, and other celebrities! Close to everything!
column8: Glam Celebrity Home in UP! 4BR. 10% for Charity!
